'''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi. '''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi. '''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi. '''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi. '''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi. '''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi. '''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi. '''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi. '''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi.
